Side dish : Onion Pappula chutneyÂ  Servings: 10 Dosa / RotiÂ  Duration: 5 minsÂ  A quick fix chutney which is onion Pappula chutney goes well with fresh steamed idly, crispy dosa, Phulka, Chapathi and rice flour roti. It a basic chutney and we usually make in our home, if youâ€™re busy and canâ€™t make any potato curry for dosa then simply prepare this chutney ahead to save your time or else you can prepare instantly with in 5 mins. So donâ€™t miss this fresh chutney, I hope you like it. Letâ€™s start with Ingredients and follows with Procedure Ingredients:
  • Split Roasted Chana dal / pappulu - 80 gms
  • Fresh coconut - 1/3 cup
  • Onion - 1 - Diced
  • Kashmiri Dry Red chillies - 3
  • Red chilly powder - 1 tsp
  • Tamarind pulp - 1 tsp
  • Salt - 1 tsp
  • Water - 100 ml
Procedure:
  • In a mixer grinder add salt, red chilly powder, dry Red chillies, tamarind, pappulu , coconut & water
  • Blend till smooth paste & Add Diced onion
  • Blend coarsely & Take out in a bowl
  • Serve it with either Chapathi / Dosa/ Idly Â /Rice flour roti
